Bases: gitbigcommits.core.git_data_collection.CommitInfo

class ExtraCommitInfo¶

This class hold info related to the commit object.

class gitbigcommits.core.git_commit_utility.GitFatCheckutility(git_folder_path, threshold_size_in_kb)[source]¶

Bases: gitbigcommits.core.git_data_collection.GitFatFiles

class GitFatCheckutility¶
Parameters:
  • git_folder_path – Directory of your git repo
  • threshold_size_in_kb – The size which you consider as big commits, given in kb.
domant_branch_info(threshold_val=4320000)[source]¶
Parameters:threshold_val – the value beyond which the branch is

considered as dormant. It is given in seconds. (default 4320000) which is 50 days. :return: a list of dictionary with branch information above the given threshold value.

form_all_info_for_a_blob_sha(blob_sha, time_zone=None)[source]¶
Parameters:
  • blob_sha – hashid of a blob object
  • time_zone – in the remote repo, the timezone may be different

from your local time zone, give your timezone. (default None). :return: a dict of all necessary info

get_all_remote_branch_list()[source]¶
Returns:all remote branches available as a list
get_blob_ids_greater_than_given_size()[source]¶
Returns:blobids greater than the given threshold size

Parameters:commit_sha – hashid of a commit object
Returns:branch name associated with the commit
get_commits_for_a_blob(blob_sha)[source]¶
Parameters:blob_sha – hashid of a blob object
Returns:all commit ids which has reference/points to that blob
get_dormant_branch_info()[source]¶
Returns:a sorted list containing ExtraCommitInfo object.

The list contains all branches available.

get_file_name_for_blob_id(blob_sha)[source]¶

gitbigcommits.core.git_data_collection module¶

class gitbigcommits.core.git_data_collection.CommitInfo(author, email, subject, timestamp)[source]¶

Bases: object

class CommitInfo¶

This is just a object to hold a commit id related info. This is used i nternally.

This object contains the following variables author: author of the commid id email: mail id of the committer subject: subject of the commit id timestamp: time when the commit happened

class gitbigcommits.core.git_data_collection.GitFatFiles(folder_path, file_size=25000)[source]¶

Bases: object

class GitFatFiles¶
Parameters:folder_path – git folder path, where the .git directory is

present :param file_size: threshold file size

find_blob_for_a_commit(commit_hash)[source]¶
Parameters:commit_hash – hashid of a commit object
Returns:all blobids which are referenced/poined by this commit object

also it returns a dict of mapping between blobid vs file names.

find_info_for_a_commit_id(commit_sha)[source]¶
Parameters:commit_sha – hashid of a commit
Returns:author_name, author_email, subject of commit, timestamp of

commit will be returned.

Change this method if you need more info from a commit id

get_all_objects_list_in_git()[source]¶
Returns:dictionary which contains all object ids as key(blob, commit)

the value maybe none if it is a commit id, if it is a blob id, value is name of the file where the blobid points to.

get_blob_ids_from_pack_file()[source]¶
Returns:list of blob ids which are greater than given specified size.

This unpacks all the index file and find the size of each blob ids.

get_commit_ids_for_a_branch()[source]¶
Returns:dictionary where commit_id is the key, and branch name as

value.

it is applicable only for all the remote branches

get_commit_list_for_a_branch(branch_name)[source]¶
Parameters:branch_name – branch name
Returns:list of commit ids associated with the branch
get_subprocess(command, shell=False)[source]¶
Parameters:
  • command – command to execute in shell
  • shell – if set to true, can cause code injection.
Returns:

output of the command
